sentences.en: A straw vote indicated eleven for the quarantine, six for the strike.
sentences.cn: 测验性投票结果是,赞成实行海上隔离的十一票, 赞成袭击的六票.

sentences.en: According to the Chinese Quarantine Law, these objects are prohibited from entering.
sentences.cn: 根据《中国检疫法》的规定, 这些属于禁止入境物品.

sentences.en: According to the Quarantine Law, these objects are prohibited from entering.
sentences.cn: 根据《检疫法》规定, 这属于禁止进境物.

sentences.en: Contact Municipal Overseas Chinese Federation, Customs, Inspection, Inspection and Quarantine.
sentences.cn: 联系市侨联 、 海关 、 边检 、 检验检疫工作.

sentences.en: During the quarantine, they will be monitored regularly by our registered nurse.
sentences.cn: 在隔离期间, 学校的注册护士将会定期照料被隔离人员.

sentences.en: He expressed his preference for the quarantine over the strike.
sentences.cn: 他表示赞成实行海上隔离,而不主张袭击.

sentences.en: Lincoln Six Echo remains in quarantine after contamination exposure.
sentences.cn: 林肯伊科六号在发现被污染后已被隔离.

sentences.en: Past experience shows that quarantine measures and embargoes on the movement of people and goods are unnecessary.
sentences.cn: 以往的经验表明，不必要采取检疫措施并对人员和货物流动加以禁止。

sentences.en: Quarantine laws prevent the sick from coming into contact with healthy persons.
sentences.cn: 检疫法不许病人接触健康人.

sentences.en: Sanitary Control on Animals for slaughtering by Supervision and Quarantine Authorities.
sentences.cn: 检验检疫部门对出口供宰动物的卫生控制.

sentences.en: She was sent home and put in quarantine.
She was sent home to Oxford and put in quarantine.
sentences.cn: 她被送回牛津的家中隔离起来。

sentences.en: The dog was kept in quarantine for six months.
sentences.cn: 这条狗被检疫隔离了六个月。
这项检疫措施现已取消.

sentences.en: The ship is still in rigorous quarantine.
sentences.cn: 该船仍在接受严格的隔离检疫.

sentences.en: To protect their business, European farmers have started to exterminate at - risk animals and quarantine the others.
sentences.cn: 为保护他们的经济, 欧洲农场主便开始消除已处于染病状态的牲畜,检疫并隔离其他动物.

sentences.en: To strengthen the computerized construction of inspection and quarantine.
sentences.cn: 加强检验检疫信息化建设.

phrases.tran_cn: 检疫所；卫生检疫所；检疫站

trans.tran_cn: 检疫期，隔离期，检疫所，隔离所，四十天的时间
trans.tran_en: a period of time when a person or animal is kept apart from others in case they are carrying a disease
to keep a person or animal apart from others for a period of time in case they are carrying a disease
